meanings.sent1: The nonsteady table wobbled when I placed my drink on it.
meanings.sent2: Her nonsteady hands made it difficult to hold the fragile vase.
meanings.sent3: The nonsteady chair seemed to have a mind of its own, tipping over unexpectedly.
meanings.sent4: His nonsteady commitment to the project caused delays in the timeline.
meanings.sent5: The nonsteady flame flickered in the gentle breeze, casting shadows on the wall.

meanings.sent1: The nonsteady weather kept us guessing if we needed an umbrella or sunglasses.
meanings.sent2: His nonsteady mood swings made it hard to predict his reactions.
meanings.sent3: The nonsteady internet connection played a game of hide and seek with us.
meanings.sent4: The nonsteady stock market kept investors on their toes.
meanings.sent5: The nonsteady rhythm of the music made it challenging to dance to.
